stats.information module¶

stats.information.DKL_discrete(P, Q, eps=1e-09)[source]¶

Compute KL divergence between discrete distributions

Parameters:
  • P (np.array) – Vector of probabilities
  • Q (np.array) – Vector of probabilities
Returns:

DKL – KL divergence from P to Q
Return type:

float
